text:
steps to reproduce:

on zones, log in as lenya. for simplicity, add user lenya to group reviewers.
submit any document, check "notify".
go to your inbox, read the message. a new, identical message will appear with an
updated timestamp.

after some submitting and publishing, more and more spurious messages crop up -
ultimately, several bogus notifications are generated for every action done.
creator: nettings@apache.org
andreas@apache.org
text:
The problem was that the event queue was not cleared after a session was
committed. It should be OK now.
